Class ManagerEmployeePane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
ManagerEmployeePane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class ManagerEmployeePane extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
Manager UI: Dashboard, Menu (with attach/detach), Ingredients, Customizations, Employees, Orders (with items), Inventory Orders, X-Report, Z-Report, Usage Report. Works with the merged ManagerDAO that includes schema-qualified SQL, attach/detach helpers, and reports.
